name: NASCAR The Game 2011
description:
Experience the thrill of the chase for the NASCAR Sprint Cup in the most
realistic NASCAR game ever developed. This is NASCAR Revolutionized!

Features

• Race in high-speed bumper-to-bumper split screen multi-player action.
•
Jostle for position to make it to “The Chase” on a track of 43
real-world racing legends.
• Battle for points, stardom and the
series championship through Career Mode.
